channel.title: Looking for host
channel.description: Hey there, I am no doubt looking for a host for my new server (currently in progress). I would like someone who I can trust with server files, and who can keep it on. I have put posts up before but not yet gotten a host! Please post here if you wish to host.

item.title: Looking for host

item.description:

Hey there, I am no doubt looking for a host for my new server (currently in progress).
